name: get_names
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool indian_names.
Tool description: API for fetching Indian Names
API description: Fetch a random list of Indian names based on specified criteria.

first.description: If True, include first names in the result. Defaults to None.

gender.description: Specify the gender for names ('male' or 'female'). Defaults to 'male'.

last.description: If True, include last names in the result. Defaults to None.

number.description: The number of names to fetch. Defaults to 5.
